alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 5:38AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...AND GENESEE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A 10 mile wide lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH will rapidly reduce visibilities to less than a quarter of a mile. This lake effect snow band is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 2 to 3 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 533 AM EST, a lake effect snow band extended northeast from Ripley to Eden to Attica. This band will continue to move very slowly southward by 730 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Darien Lakes State Park, Evans, Boston, Eden, Marilla, Warsaw, Bennington, Colden, Orchard Park, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Attica, Angola, Mayville and North Collins. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 61. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Observe all existing travel bans. &&

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
